messages.messageBody:
huh??? whatchamean, Julie??? I was being TOTALLY SERIOUS!!! soooo, does
that mean YOU'RE LAUGHING @ MEEEEEE or *with* meeeeee??? hey, goodness, if
ya can't be lighthearted once in a while you're in for a VERY LONG BORING
life :)

Pris ~> who'z VERY INSECURE bout folks LAUGHING @ HER (NOT)!!! <G>

WARNING: I cannot be help responsible for the above, as apparently my cats
have learned how to type ...

From: <Jaam1224@...>

cats
